Package model

Class LanguageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.LanguageLoader
  • public class LanguageLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing the language options

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static LanguageLoader instance
      The singleton object Language loader.
      private static java.util.Locale locale
      Represents a specific linguistic region Holds information of the language and country Locale option defines the language which is used in UI
      private static java.util.Properties textResources
      A property list

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private LanguageLoader()
      A private constructor of the singleton object Set's the locale used default to english (United Kingdom)

      • instance

        private static LanguageLoader instance
        The singleton object Language loader. Attribute is null if the object is not yet created

        Represents a specific linguistic region Holds information of the language and country Locale option defines the language which is used in UI

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LanguageLoader getInstance()
        Method which enables to work with a singleton object Language loader. When called the first time, creates a Language Loader-object. After the object is created, always returns the same exact object.
        Returns:
        Language Loader object

      • getResourceBundle

        public java.util.ResourceBundle getResourceBundle()
        Recource bundle contains locale-specific objects Gets a resource bundle using the specified base name and locale
        Returns:
        the recource bundle

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale​(java.lang.String language,
                      java.lang.String country)
        Creates a new locale-object and set's the language which is used in UI Loads the textResources where the language options are hold
        Parameters:
        language - the language wanted
        country - the specific country

      • setLocale

        private void setLocale​(java.util.Locale locale)

      • getLocale

        public java.util.Locale getLocale()

      • getTextResources

        private void getTextResources()
        Creates a new properties object Loads the resources where the language options are hold

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString​(java.lang.String key)
        Used for all text in the UI. Get's the string needed from the resources
        Parameters:
        key - the key which holds all available language options for a specific String
        Returns:
        the wanted String in the language which is set in locale
